body:
New feature release in the v4 series.

Release announcement: https://timeline.noticeable.io/cbzeG7wTvAIqj21zbUmx/posts/modules-latest-aka-4-5-0-released

In addition to introducing new version 4.5.0, the quarantine variable list of Modules is updated to also include `LD_PRELOAD` in addition to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` (to avoid side-effect when the first depends on the latter).
title: environment-modules: add version 4.5.0
